CustomField.description:
IF ( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Fixa", IF ( DirectDebit__c = False,IMAGE("/resource/1606328477000/Alert?","Yellow",16,20)/*&$Setup.Alarm__c.OfertarDebAutFixa__c,IMAGE("/resource/1606328554000/Correto?","Green",15,15)& $Setup.Alarm__c.DebAutCadastradoFixa__c)&BR()&
IF ( IsDigitalBill__c = False,IMAGE("/resource/1606328477000/Alert?","Yellow",16,20)/*&$Setup.Alarm__c.OfertarFaturaDigitalFixa__c,IMAGE("/resource/1606328554000/Correto?","Green",15,15)& $Setup.Alarm__c.FatDigitalCadastradaFixa__c),
IF ( DirectDebit__c = False,IMAGE("/resource/1606328477000/Alert?","Yellow",16,20)/*&$Setup.Alarm__c.OfertarDebAutMovel__c,IMAGE("/resource/1606328554000/Correto?","Green",15,15)& $Setup.Alarm__c.DebAutCadastradoMovel__c)&BR()&
IF ( IsDigitalBill__c = False,IMAGE("/resource/1606328477000/Alert?","Yellow",16,20)/*&$Setup.Alarm__c.OfertarFaturaDigitalMovel__c,IMAGE("/resource/1606328554000/Correto?","Green",15,15)& $Setup.Alarm__c.FatDigitalCadastradaMovel__c))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Débito automático NÃO está ativo, recomende ao cliente.
